PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Ignite effects deal damage and grant Strength.
Bastion applies debuffs to enemies and buffs to yourself.
Scavenge rewards with extra gold, scrap and loot.
Aggression, Defenses and resources... Something went wrong here.
At the end of your turn if you have one or more Traits in hand, trigger escalating effects based on how many you hold.
Not discarded at end of turn. Loses 1 Durability when [#03befc]triggered[], Exhausts at 0. Play from hand to unequip.
ALL cards target this enemy. Only one enemy can be Targeted at a time.
Increase the durability of an equipment.
Fuse 3 cards of the same rarity to permanently combine them into a stronger card.
Has a limited amount of uses. When depleted, remove this card from your deck.
At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to your Metallicize.
Block is not removed at the start of your turn.
Deals damage at the end of your turn. If this kills, keep half of your Charge.
Charge cannot fall below your Capacity at turn end.
Augments are permanent character upgrades unlocked during your run.
Whenever you use the Scry button, Scry #b1 less card.
Lose [E] to play this at combat start, if you have no energy shuffle a #yVoid into your draw pile instead. Replaces #yInnate.
At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to your plated armor. Unblocked attack damage reduces Plated Armor by 1.
Whenever is manually discarded from your hand or draw pile, Scry included.
Can be played a second time for a different effect.
Whenever you manually discard a card from your hand during your turn.
The first time you play an equipment during your turn.
The second time you play an equipment and is discarded from your hand.
Includes blocked damage.
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
